TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ActionsPane implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示一个 Word 或 Excel 的文档级自定义中“文档操作”任务窗格的自定义用户界面。

span.span: Represents a custom user interface for the **Document Actions** task pane in a document-level customization for Word or Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Excel 或 Word 的文档级自定义公开对象。Every document-level customization for Excel or Word exposes an object. 你可以使用此对象自定义用户界面的**文档操作**的文档级项目中的任务窗格。You can use this object to customize the user interface of the **Document Actions** task pane in a document-level project. 若要获取对象，请使用`ActionsPane`字段`ThisDocument`（对于 Word) 类或`ThisWorkbook`（针对 Excel) 项目中的类。To get the object, use the `ActionsPane` field of the `ThisDocument` class (for Word) or the `ThisWorkbook` class (for Excel) in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[操作窗格概述](/visualstudio/vsto/actions-pane-overview.md)。For more information, see [Actions Pane Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/actions-pane-overview.md). 每个对象扩展基础的 Windows 窗体，它提供一个用户界面，你可以自定义。Each object extends an underlying Windows Forms that provides a user interface that you can customize. 大部分成员对应的基础成员。Most of the members correspond to members of the underlying . 使用以下成员才能访问操作窗格中特定功能：Use the following members to access actions pane-specific functionality: - 方法。 method. 使用此方法来分离操作窗格与文档或工作簿。Use this method to detach the actions pane from the document or workbook. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性以防止或允许最终用户分离操作窗格与文档或工作簿。Use this property to prevent or allow end users to detach the actions pane from the document or workbook. - 属性。 property. 此属性用于确定是否操作窗格停靠到顶部或底部的文档或工作簿，或左侧或右侧的文档或工作簿。Use this property to determine whether the actions pane is docked to the top or bottom of the document or workbook, or to the left or right of the document or workbook. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性指定控件的方向在操作窗格堆叠。Use this property to specify the direction that controls are stacked on the actions pane. - 事件。 event. 此属性用于确定当将操作窗格停靠到不同的位置。Use this property to determine when the actions pane is docked to a different location. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个简单的操作窗格，它自动调整其内容的对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple actions pane that automatically adjusts the alignment of its contents. 当用户通过将操作窗格移动到不同的应用程序窗口中，一部分更改的操作窗格方向或用户单击中的操作窗格中，控件属性用于确定的新值属性。When the user changes the orientation of the actions pane by moving the actions pane to a different part of the application window, or the user clicks on a control in the actions pane, the property is used to determine the new value of the property. 若要运行此代码，调用`InitActionsPane`方法从`ThisWorkbook_Startup`的 Excel 的文档级项目的事件处理程序。To run this code, call the `InitActionsPane` method from the `ThisWorkbook_Startup` event handler of a document-level project for Excel. [!code-csharp[Trin_ActionsPane#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ActionsPane/CS/thisworkbook.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ActionsPane#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ActionsPane/VB/thisworkbook.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果操作窗格浮动或停靠在左侧或右侧，为垂直。If the actions pane is floating, or is docked to the left or right, the is vertical. 如果操作窗格停靠在底部或之上，为水平方向。If the actions pane is docked to the bottom or the top, the is horizontal. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个操作窗格，自动调整其内容的对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates an actions pane that automatically adjusts the alignment of its contents. 当用户通过将操作窗格移动到不同的应用程序窗口中，一部分更改的操作窗格方向或用户单击中的操作窗格中，控件属性用于确定的新值属性。When the user changes the orientation of the actions pane by moving the actions pane to a different part of the application window, or the user clicks on a control in the actions pane, the property is used to determine the new value of the property. 若要运行此代码，调用`InitActionsPane`方法从`ThisWorkbook_Startup`的 Microsoft Office Excel 项目的事件处理程序。To run this code, call the `InitActionsPane` method from the `ThisWorkbook_Startup` event handler of a Microsoft Office Excel project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户将发生此事件**文档操作任务窗格**到相对于文档的新位置。This event occurs when a user moves the **Document Actions task pane** to a new location relative to the document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个简单的操作窗格，它自动调整其内容的对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple actions pane that automatically adjusts the alignment of its contents. 用户将操作窗格中移到应用程序窗口中，事件处理程序的不同部分事件使用属性来确定操作窗格中的控件的新堆叠顺序。When the user moves the actions pane to a different part of the application window, the event handler for the event uses the property to determine the new stack order of the controls in the actions pane. 若要运行此代码，调用`InitActionsPane`方法从`ThisWorkbook_Startup`的 Microsoft Office Excel 项目的事件处理程序。To run this code, call the `InitActionsPane` method from the `ThisWorkbook_Startup` event handler of a Microsoft Office Excel project. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件在操作窗格上堆叠的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the direction that the controls are stacked on the actions pane.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示控件在操作窗格上堆叠的方向。

span.span: A value that indicates the direction that the controls are stacked on the actions pane.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 堆叠顺序取决于操作窗格的方向。The stack order depends on the orientation of the actions pane. 如果操作窗格的方向设置为水平，你可能想要的堆栈顺序设置为`FromLeft`或`FromRight`值枚举。If the orientation of the actions pane is set to horizontal, you might want to set the stack order to the `FromLeft` or `FromRight` values of the enumeration. 如果操作窗格的方向为垂直设置，你可能想要的堆栈顺序设置为`FromTop`或`FromBottom`值枚举。If the orientation of the actions pane is set to vertical, you might want to set the stack order to the `FromTop` or `FromBottom` values of the enumeration. 通过对操作窗格方向的更改来传递事件。Changes to the orientation of the actions pane are communicated through the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个操作窗格，自动调整其内容的对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates an actions pane that automatically adjusts the alignment of its contents. 当用户通过将操作窗格移动到不同的应用程序窗口中，一部分更改的操作窗格方向或用户单击中的操作窗格中，控件属性用于确定的新值属性。When the user changes the orientation of the actions pane by moving the actions pane to a different part of the application window, or the user clicks on a control in the actions pane, the property is used to determine the new value of the property. 若要运行此代码，调用`InitActionsPane`方法从`ThisWorkbook_Startup`的 Microsoft Office Excel 项目的事件处理程序。To run this code, call the `InitActionsPane` method from the `ThisWorkbook_Startup` event handler of a Microsoft Office Excel project.
